text: The 2011 Daytona 500 took place on February 20th 2011 at the Daytona International Speedway. It was the first race of the 2011 NASCAR Sprint Cup Series. Dale Earnhardt, Jr. won the pole in qualifying, however he did not start in 1st place because he crashed his car during practice. The race was won by Trevor Bayne. At 20 years old, he is the youngest driver to win the race. ==Results== Position Car Number Driver Team Manufacturer 1 21 Trevor Bayne Wood Brothers Racing Ford 2 99 Carl Edwards Roush Fenway Racing Ford 3 34 David Gilliland Front Row Motorsports Ford 4 47 Bobby Labonte JTG Daugherty Racing Toyota 5 22 Kurt Busch Penske Racing Dodge 6 42 Juan Pablo Montoya Earnhardt Ganassi Racing Chevrolet 7 78 Regan Smith Furniture Row Racing Chevrolet 8 18 Kyle Busch Joe Gibbs Racing Toyota 9 27 Paul Menard Richard Childress Racing Chevrolet 10 5 Mark Martin Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet 11 43 A.
